l = [1,6,7]
c = 1
for x in range(3,100001):
    if x%2==1:
        a = l[c]*6
        l.append(a)
    else:
        l.append(a+1)
        c+=1
n = int(stdin.readline())
for _ in range(n):
    s = int(stdin.readline())
    print(l[s-1])

    b=[x]

    arr+=b

# cook your dish here
def nthMagicNo(n): 
  
    pow = 1
    answer = 0
    while (n): 
        if (n & 1): 
            answer += pow
        n >>= 1
        pow = pow*6
    return answer 
    
for _ in range(int(input())):
    a = int(input())
    print(nthMagicNo(a))

t=int(input())
while t:
    t=t-1
    n=int(input())
    x=bin(n)
    x=x[2:]
    x=x[::-1]
    z=1
    s=0
    for i in range(len(x)):
        if x[i]=="1":
            s+=z
        z*=6
    print(s)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = bin(int(input()))
    n = int(n[2:], 6)
    print(n)

import sys
# cook your dish here
T=int(input())
system=[0,1]
new_multiplier=1
while(len(system)<110000):
    new_multiplier*=6
    new_list=list( int(x+new_multiplier) for x in system)
    system+=new_list
for t in range(T):
    N=int(input())
    print(system[N])

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    p = bin(N)[2:]
    ans  = 0
    cnt  = 0
    p = p[-1::-1]
    for i in p:
        ans += (int(i) * 6 ** cnt)
        cnt+=1
    print(ans)
